text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Because people STILL CANNOT GET TESTED you fucking incompetent piece of shit!! 

Your own CDC website Self-Checker says to STAY HOME even with COVID-19 symptoms like fever/chills/shortness of breath/cough. We need MORE TESTS!! https://t.co/3jhqWC9TrT
